items.title: Reliance only Indian firm in highly valued global technology companies list
items.description: The investment is not just in chips, but also in new data centres, networking infrastructure, and energy systems to support growing demand.

items.title: Is Trump’s doubling of steel and aluminium tariffs a death blow to the industry?
items.description: While a 25 percent tariff on these key industrial metals was bad enough, a doubling to 50 percent is a punitive measure to discourage imports and revive lethargic domestic output

items.title: Air India CEO says Pakistan airspace ban adding to flying costs
items.description: The new policy, if it draws industry giants, will also intensify competition for local automakers who currently dominate the EV segment.

items.title: Interglobe doubles wide-body Airbus order, announces more codeshares in expansion push
items.description: Last year in April, the airline had decided to induct 30 widebody Airbus A350-900 aircraft in its fleet, with a purchase right for an additional 70 aircraft. On June 1, the airline has converted 30 of its purchase rights for 70 aircraft into a firm order.

items.title: Lemon Tree Hotels: Better occupancy, room rates drive performance
items.description: The demand momentum remains strong and LMNT has lined up aggressive inventory addition plans.

items.title: HDFC ERGO to maintain lean banca exposure, targets above-industry growth in FY26: CEO Anuj Tyagi
items.description: Tyagi says, the company will instead bet on its agency network, direct-to-customer rural outreach, and commercial lines

items.title: EY India Chairman Rajiv Memani takes over as CII President for FY26
items.description: He takes over from Sanjiv Puri, Chairman & Managing Director of ITC Ltd
